Actions.Action:
from class_user import User from update import Update
import localization
from hashlib import md5
args = request.arguments loc = localization.get_lang() ver = Update.get_cur_version()
url = args["back_url"] if "back_url" in args else "/Documents_share.vdom" self.container_center.form_login.back_url.value = url
Update.run()
license_igree = VDOM_CONFIG_1[str(application.id)] if str(application.id) in VDOM_CONFIG_1 else "0" admin_user = User.admin_exists()
if license_igree == "0" and not admin_user: """user nead for 'I agree' with VDOM2 license""" response.redirect("/Registration.vdom")
if admin_user is None: response.redirect("/Registration.vdom")
# server version is '1.(server_version).(revision_version)' if str(server.version.split('.')[2]) < '6336': self.growl.title = loc["hp_notify"] self.growl.text = loc["hp_updateserver"] self.growl.active = "1"
if "logoff" in args: User.logoff() response.redirect("/Home_page.vdom")
if "login" in args and "password" in args: login = args["login"] password = args.get("password").encode("utf8") password = md5(password).hexdigest() back_url = args["back_url"] if "back_url" in args else "/Documents_share.vdom"
loc = localization.get_lang()
user = User.login(login, password) if user: try: self.connector.fields_list() except Exception, e: pass
response.redirect(back_url)
else:
self.growl2.title = loc["hp_errtitle"] self.growl2.text = loc["hp_errinput"] #self.growl2.active = "1"
self.container_center.form_login.login.value = login self.container_center.form_login.back_url.value = back_url
#self.container_center.form_login.login.action("setFocus") #debug("SESSION = "+str(request.session))

import hashlib from class_user import User from class_group import Group from html_wrapper import Html_wrapper import localization from io import StringIO def popup_growl(ttl, msg): self.growl.title, self.growl.text, self.growl.active = ttl, msg, "1" user = User.current() args = request.arguments loc = localization.get_lang() self.title = loc["header_hgmb"] + " » " + loc["header_uag"] try: if user: if user.is_admin(): ### "checking INPUTS" ### if "del_user" in args: del_user = args["del_user"] a_user = User.get_by_guid(del_user) if a_user: a_user.delete() response.redirect("/Users_and_groups.vdom") elif "new_group" in args: new_group = args["new_group"] if new_group != "": group = Group() group.name = new_group try: group.save() except Exception, e: popup_growl(loc["uag_message"],str(e)) elif "email" in args: email = args["email"] password = args["password"] r_password = args["r_password"] fn = args["first_name"] ln = args["last_name"] keywords = args["keywords"] if email and password and password == r_password: password = hashlib.md5(password).hexdigest() a_user = User() a_user.email = email a_user.password = password a_user.first_name = fn a_user.last_name = ln a_user.keywords = keywords try: a_user.save() except Exception, e: e = str(e) popup_growl(loc["uag_message"],loc[e] if e in loc else e ) else: popup_growl(loc["uag_message"],loc["hp_wrongconfirm"]) elif "del_group" in args: del_group = args["del_group"] a_group = Group.get_by_guid(del_group) if a_group: a_group.delete() response.redirect("/Users_and_groups.vdom") ### "RENDER" ### new_group_form = """
%s """ % loc["uag_addnewgroup"] new_user_form = """
%s """ % loc["uag_addnewuser"] self.hpt_js.htmlcode = self.hpt_js.htmlcode % { "delete" : loc["delete"], "cancel" : loc["cancel"], "uag_delete_confirm": loc["uag_delete_confirm"], "uag_adduser" : loc["uag_adduser"], "uag_email" : loc["uag_email"], "uag_pass" : loc["uag_pass"], "uag_confirm" : loc["uag_confirm"], "create" : loc["create"], "uag_newgroup" : loc["uag_newgroup"], "uag_first_name" : loc["uag_first_name"], "uag_last_name" : loc["uag_last_name"], "uag_keywords" : loc["uag_keywords"], } res = StringIO() backpath = " / %s" % loc["admin_header"] res.write(Html_wrapper.get_title(loc["uag_title"], backpath=backpath)) current_users = len(User.get_all()) max_users = user.max_users unlim = True if max_users >= user.big_value else False res.write("

%(uag_users)s%(limits)s:

" % { "uag_users" : loc["uag_users"], "limits" : "" if unlim else " (%i / %i)" % (current_users, max_users) }) admin_email = User.current_admin().email for a_user in User.get_all(): delete_url = "" if a_user.email != admin_email: delete_url = """ """ % { "guid" : a_user.guid, "delete" : loc["delete"], "hpt_id" : self.cnt_confirm.hpt_text.id.replace("-","_"), "email" : "%s %s" % (loc['fs_delete'], a_user.email) } res.write("""
  • %(email)s %(delete_url)s
    • """%{ "email": a_user.email, "guid": a_user.guid, "edit" : loc["edit"], "delete_url" : delete_url} ) res.write(new_user_form) res.write("

    %(uag_groups)s:


    " % { "uag_groups" : loc["uag_groups"] }) for group in Group.get_all(): res.write("""
  • %(name)s
    • """% { "name":group.name, "guid":group.guid, "edit" : loc["edit"], "delete":loc["delete"], "hpt_id" : self.cnt_confirm.hpt_text.id.replace("-","_"), "name_title" : "%s %s" % (loc['fs_delete'], group.name) } ) res.write(new_group_form) self.hpt_users.htmlcode = res.getvalue() res.close() else: response.redirect("/File_server.vdom") else: back_url = Html_wrapper.get_logout_back_url() response.redirect("/home_page.vdom?back_url="+back_url) pass except Exception, e: pass raise

EDIT USER container self.cnt_user.form_edit_user.email.value = user_profile.email self.cnt_user.form_edit_user.email.mode = "0" if user.is_admin() else "2" self.cnt_user.form_edit_user.first_name.value = user_profile.first_name or "" self.cnt_user.form_edit_user.last_name.value = user_profile.last_name or "" self.cnt_user.form_edit_user.keywords.mode = "0" if user.is_admin() else "2" self.cnt_user.form_edit_user.keywords.value = user_profile.keywords or "" self.cnt_user.form_edit_user.user_id.value = user_profile.id self.cnt_user.txt_edit.value = "%s" % loc["edit"] self.cnt_user.txt_email.value = "%s:" % loc["uag_email"] self.cnt_user.txt_newpass.value = "%s:" % loc["uag_newpass"] self.cnt_user.txt_confirm.value = "%s:" % loc["uag_confirmpass"] self.cnt_user.txt_first_name.value = "%s:" % loc["uag_first_name"] self.cnt_user.txt_last_name.value = "%s:" % loc["uag_last_name"] self.cnt_user.txt_keywords.value = "%s:" % loc["uag_keywords"] self.cnt_user.btn_update.text = "%s" % loc["update"] # EDIT GROUPS container if user.is_admin(): user_groups = [(g.guid, g.name) for g in user_profile.get_groups()] all_groups = [(g.guid, g.name) for g in Group.get_all()] rest = set(all_groups) - set(user_groups) if user_groups else all_groups self.cnt_groups.visible = "1" self.cnt_groups.f_groups.user_id.value = user_profile.id self.cnt_groups.btn_add.text = "%s" % loc["add"] self.cnt_groups.f_groups.group.value1 = "|".join([g[0] for g in sorted(rest)]) self.cnt_groups.f_groups.group.value = "|".join([g[1] for g in sorted(rest)]) self.cnt_groups.txt_addnewgroup.value = "%s:" % loc["uag_addnewgroup"] self.cnt_groups.txt_groups.value = "%s:" % loc["uag_groups"] if user_groups: self.cnt_groups.hpt_group.htmlcode = "
    %s
"%( "".join(["""
  • %(group_name)s (%(delete)s)

    • """ % { "guid":user_profile.guid, "group_guid": g[0], "group_name": g[1], "delete" : loc["delete"] } for g in user_groups]) ) self.cnt_groups.height = str(int(self.cnt_groups.height) + \ (len(user_groups)-1)*27) else: response.redirect("/home_page.vdom?back_url="+get_logout_back_url())

from class_user import User from class_group import Group from html_wrapper import Html_wrapper from class_document_share import Document_share import localization user = User.current() args = request.arguments loc = localization.get_lang() group_form = "" res = "" self.title = loc["header_hgmb"] + " » " + loc["header_g"] def get_group_form(user, group): hiden_space = ""#""""""% {"guid":group.guid} delete_link = ""#""" %(uag_deleteall)s"""%{"guid":group.guid, "uag_deleteall":loc["uag_deleteall"]} cur_users = "" grop_users = [(usr.email, usr.guid ) for usr in group.get_users()] for a_user in sorted(set(grop_users)): cur_users += """
  • %(user_email)s (%(delete)s)
    • """%{"guid":group.guid,"user_guid":a_user[1], "user_email": a_user[0], "delete" : loc["delete"]} avalible_users = "" all_users = [(usr.email, usr.guid) for usr in User.get_all()] add_users = set(all_users) - set(grop_users) for a_user in sorted(set(add_users)): avalible_users += """ """ %{"guid":str(a_user[1]), "email":a_user[0] } ret_data = """

    %(uag_users)s:

    %(delete_link)s
      %(cur_users)s
    %(hiden_space)s
    %(uag_adduser)s:
    """%{ "delete_link":delete_link, "cur_users":cur_users, "hiden_space":hiden_space, "avalible_users":avalible_users, "uag_users" : loc["uag_users"], "uag_adduser" : loc["uag_adduser"], "add" : loc["add"] } return ret_data try: if user: if user.is_admin(): if "guid" in args: guid = args["guid"] group = Group.get_by_guid(guid) if group: if "acl_type": import utils_old redirect = "/Group.vdom?guid=" + group.guid utils_old.execute_ACL(args, group, redirect ) if "add_user" in args: add_user = args["add_user"] group.add_user(add_user) response.redirect("/Group.vdom?guid=" + group.guid) if "delete" in args: delete = args["delete"] group.delete_user(delete) response.redirect("/Group.vdom?guid=" + group.guid) group_form = get_group_form(user,group ) else: pass response.redirect("/Users_and_groups.vdom") back_url = """ / %(uag_title)s""" % {"uag_title" : loc["uag_title"]} title = Html_wrapper.get_title( group.name, back_url) self.hpt_data.htmlcode = title + group_form # +"
    "+ Html_wrapper.get_documents_share_form(group,"/Group.vdom" ) else: response.redirect("/File_server.vdom") else: back_url = Html_wrapper.get_logout_back_url() response.redirect("/home_page.vdom?back_url="+back_url) except Exception, e: pass raise

from helper import ssn_scalar
# current subjects users_current = ssn_scalar("users_acl_temp",[]) groups_current = ssn_scalar("groups_acl_temp",[])
# current dialogs dialog_rules = ssn_scalar("dialog_rules") # this dialog is going to be refreshed dialog_subjects = ssn_scalar("dialog_subjects") # from this one we'll get selected subjects
# getting selected subjects selected_users, selected_groups = dialog_subjects.get_selected_subjects()
for user in selected_users: users_current.append(user) if user not in users_current else None
for group in selected_groups: groups_current.append(group) if group not in groups_current else None
dialog_rules.set_data(users_current, groups_current) dialog_rules.render()

%s
%s"%( # str([u.email for u in users]), # str([g.name for g in groups]), # str(object_to_delete) # ) #]) users.remove(object_to_delete) if is_group=="0" else groups.remove(object_to_delete) dialog_rules.set_data(users, groups) dialog_rules.render() #self.growl.action("show",["REMOVE",str(request.arguments["guid"])])

from widget_share_file_table import WidgetShareFileTable from widget_share_file_title import WidgetShareFileTitle from widget_permissions_dialog import WidgetPermissionsDialog from class_share_dir import ShareDir from class_share_file import ShareFile from helper import scalar, ssn_scalar from class_user import User, rules
# event params guid = scalar("keyField","") # guid of the file share object cellData = scalar("cellData","") headerData = scalar("headerData","") # header
file_share = ssn_scalar("file_share") parent_dir = ssn_scalar("parent_dir","") user = User.current()
# need to get the column click table_header = WidgetShareFileTable.header_format()
# FIRST HEADER: open object - folder or file if table_header[1] == headerData: fso = ShareDir.get_by_guid(guid, ignore_is_dir=True) if fso.is_dir == "0": """ need to download object """ download_link = "/File_share.vdom?share=%s&parent_dir=%s%s" % ( file_share.guid, parent_dir.guid if parent_dir else "", "&download=%s" % guid )
self.action("goTo",[download_link]) else: """ need to open directory. If no directory (empty guid) - load root folder """ #dirs, files = fso.list_dir()
# get all share objects for current directory dirs_all, files_all = fso.list_dir() dirs, files = [],[]
# filter objects which user can't see [dirs.append(dir_obj) for dir_obj in dirs_all if user.can(rules["SEE"], dir_obj.guid) or user.can(rules["USER_ADMIN"], file_share.guid)] [files.append(file_obj) for file_obj in files_all if user.can(rules["SEE"], file_obj.guid) or user.can(rules["USER_ADMIN"], file_share.guid)]
session["parent_dir"] = fso session["keyList"] = []
# for adding file form - need to remember the parent_dir self.d_addfile.form_addfile.parent_dir.value = fso.guid # if parent_dir else ""
# HPT_TITLE: directory title (from current to root) html_title = WidgetShareFileTitle(self.hpt_title) html_title.set_data(user, fso) html_title.render()
# DATATABLE: table filling with files and dirs dtable_share_objects = WidgetShareFileTable(self.cnt_table.dt_share_files) dtable_share_objects.set_data(dirs, files, fso) dtable_share_objects.render()
if not user.can(rules["WRITE"], file_share.guid): self.toolbar.visible="0" self.cnt_table.top = "180"
elif table_header[2] == headerData: # if need to do something with created_date pass
elif table_header[3] == headerData: if not user.can(user.rules["USER_ADMIN"], file_share.guid): import localization loc = localization.get_lang() self.growl.action("show",[loc["hp_errtitle"], loc["ACCESS_DENIED"]]) #"You are not an admin of current file share" else: # open permissions dialog fso = ShareDir.get_by_guid(guid, ignore_is_dir=True)
users, groups = fso.users_acl(), fso.groups_acl()
dialog_rules = WidgetPermissionsDialog( dialog = self.d_rules, vdom_html = self.d_rules.hpt_rules, btn_submit = self.d_rules.btn_rules_save, btn_cancel = self.d_rules.btn_rules_cancel, btn_add_acl = self.d_rules.btn_rules_add, btn_rename = self.d_rules.form_rename.btn_rename_submit ) dialog_rules.set_data(users, groups) #raise Exception("TEST") dialog_rules.render()
self.d_rules.form_rename.share_name.action("setValue",[fso.name]) self.d_rules.action("show",[300])
session["users_acl_temp"] = users session["groups_acl_temp"] = groups session["dialog_rules"] = dialog_rules session["share_object"] = fso

from helper import scalar, ssn_scalar from class_share_dir import ShareDir from widget_share_file_table import WidgetShareFileTable from class_ACL_proxy import ACL_record

""" File share page
Description: used like a browser inside appropriate file share. """
from class_user import User, rules from class_share_dir import ShareDir from class_share_file import ShareFile from helper import scalar, get_logout_back_url, ssn_scalar import widget_file_share from widget_share_file_table import WidgetShareFileTable from widget_share_file_title import WidgetShareFileTitle
user = User.current()
file_share = scalar("share", castto = ShareDir.get_by_guid) parent_dir = scalar("parent_dir", castto = ShareDir.get_by_guid) or file_share download_file = scalar("download", castto = ShareFile.get_by_guid) upload_file = request.arguments.get("upload_2", u"", castto=Attachment) download_list = scalar("downloadlist",castto = str) keyList = ssn_scalar("keyList",[]) session_parent_dir = ssn_scalar("parent_dir",'')
#raise Exception(str(dict([k, obsolete_request.arguments[k]] for k in obsolete_request.arguments if k not in ["sid", "sender"]))) # drop if session were closed
if not file_share and isinstance(parent_dir, ShareDir): file_share = parent_dir.top_folder
if not user: response.redirect("/home_page.vdom?back_url=%s" % get_logout_back_url())
# drop if bad file_share input if not file_share: response.redirect("/File_server.vdom")
if not file_share.is_top_folder: response.redirect("/File_server.vdom")
# uploading new file. Creating ShareFile instance and saving # will be dropped if user don't have write access or higher for current file share #raise Exception(str(upload_file.name)) if upload_file and user.can(rules["WRITE"], file_share.guid): sf = ShareFile() sf.parent_guid = parent_dir.guid # if parent_dir else file_share.guid sf.name = upload_file.name.decode("utf8") sf.save(upload_file.handler) # file handler
file_share.copy_acls_to(sf)
# downloading file list # TODO: acces control elif download_list and keyList and session_parent_dir: session_parent_dir.send_files(keyList)
# downloading file # will be dropped if user has not direct access to the file or not an admin for a current file share elif download_file and (user.can(rules["SEE"], download_file.guid) or user.can(rules["USER_ADMIN"], file_share.guid)): download_file.download()
# get all share objects for current directory dirs_all, files_all = parent_dir.list_dir() dirs, files = [],[]
# filter objects which user can't see [dirs.append(dir_obj) for dir_obj in dirs_all if user.can(rules["SEE"], dir_obj.guid) or user.can(rules["USER_ADMIN"], file_share.guid)] [files.append(file_obj) for file_obj in files_all if user.can(rules["SEE"], file_obj.guid) or user.can(rules["USER_ADMIN"], file_share.guid)]
# putting data to session session["file_share"] = file_share session["parent_dir"] = parent_dir session["keyList"] = []
# SELF: title widget_file_share.set_page_title( self )
# HPT_TITLE: directory title (from current to root) html_title = WidgetShareFileTitle(self.hpt_title) html_title.set_data(user, parent_dir) html_title.render()
# BUTTONS: languages, positions and sizing if user.can(rules["WRITE"], file_share.guid): widget_file_share.edit_buttons([ self.toolbar.btn_add, self.toolbar.btn_addfolder, self.toolbar.btn_delete, self.toolbar.btn_download, self.toolbar.btn_copy, self.toolbar.btn_mark, self.toolbar.btn_move, self.toolbar.btn_print ] ) else: self.toolbar.visible="0" self.cnt_table.top = "180"
# for adding file form - need to remember the parent_dir self.d_addfile.form_addfile.parent_dir.value = parent_dir.guid # if parent_dir else file_share.guid
# DATATABLE: table filling with files and dirs dtable_share_objects = WidgetShareFileTable(self.cnt_table.dt_share_files) dtable_share_objects.set_data(dirs, files, parent_dir) dtable_share_objects.render()

from class_user import User from class_folder import Folder from html_wrapper import Html_wrapper from class_document_share import Document_share import localization from class_ACL_proxy import rules from StringIO import StringIO from helper import scalar user = User.current() args = request.arguments loc = localization.get_lang() self.title = loc["header_hgmb"] + " » " + loc["header_dss"] def html_escape(text): html_escape_table = { "&": "&", '"': """, "'": "'", ">": ">", "<": "<", } return "".join(html_escape_table.get(c,c) for c in text) if "mess" in args: message = args["mess"] self.growl2.title = loc["hp_errtitle"] self.growl2.text = loc[message] if message in loc else message # DOCUMENT_SHARE_IS_NOT_EMPTY self.growl2.active = "1" if user: mess = "" user_is_admin = user.can(rules["ADMIN"], application.id) self.cnt_title.hpt_title.htmlcode = u""" %(ds_title)s%(guid_map)s """ % { "ds_title" : loc["ds_title"], "guid_map": Html_wrapper.get_guid_map("",loc["header_sitemap"]) } if "del_folder" in args and args["del_folder"] !="" and user_is_admin: folder = args.get("del_folder", castto=Folder.get_by_guid) if folder: debug(str(self.connector)+" : "+str(self.search)) folder.set_xapy_access(self.connector, self.search) try: folder.delete() except Exception, e: mess = "?mess="+str(e) response.redirect("/Documents_share.vdom"+mess) elif "new_folder" in args and args["new_folder"] !="" and user_is_admin: new_folder = scalar("new_folder") folder = Folder() folder.name = new_folder folder.save() response.redirect("/Documents_share.vdom") self.hpt_data.htmlcode = Html_wrapper.get_ds_catalog(user,"") # html helper self.cnt_srchinfo.front.text.htmlcode = Html_wrapper.get_search_helper( self.cnt_srchinfo.front.text.id.replace("-","_") ) else: response.redirect("/home_page.vdom")

[base64 representation of file] """ share_guid = filename = base64_data = metafields = "" guid = dom_param.getElementsByTagName("share_guid") if guid and guid[0].firstChild: share_guid = guid[0].firstChild.nodeValue fname = dom_param.getElementsByTagName("filename") if fname and fname[0].firstChild: filename = fname[0].firstChild.nodeValue text = dom_param.getElementsByTagName("text") if text and text[0].firstChild: text = text[0].firstChild.nodeValue else: text = None data = dom_param.getElementsByTagName("data") if data and data[0].firstChild: base64_data = data[0].firstChild.nodeValue meta = {} metafields = dom_param.getElementsByTagName("field") #debug("metafields: " +str(metafields)) if metafields: id = value = "" for metafield in metafields: id = value = "" fid = metafield.getElementsByTagName("id") if fid and fid[0].firstChild: id = fid[0].firstChild.nodeValue fvalue = metafield.getElementsByTagName("value") if fvalue and fvalue[0].firstChild: value = fvalue[0].firstChild.nodeValue meta_instance = Metafield.get_by_id(id) if meta_instance and meta_instance.type_id == 5: ssf = SmartSubFolder.get_by_name_and_parent_guid(value, meta_instance.constraint) if ssf: value = ssf.guid meta[ id ] = value #.encode("utf8") #debug("meta = " + str(meta)) doc_share = Document_share.get_by_guid(share_guid); if doc_share: doc_share.set_connector(self.connector) doc_share.set_search(self.search) import base64 binary_data = base64.b64decode(str(base64_data)) result = doc_share.put_document(filename, binary_data, meta, text) session["response"] = "ok" else: err = err%{"code":"26", "description":"Wrong guid"} session["response"] = err else: err = err%{"code":"5", "description":"User is not logged"} session["response"] = err except Exception, e: import traceback er = traceback.format_exc() debug("Error: "+ str(er )) err = err%{"code":"0", "description":"Server error:"+str(er)} session["response"] = err else: err = err%{"code":"14", "description":"xml_data is absent"} session["response"] = err

try: import xml.dom from utils.uuid import uuid4 from hashlib import md5 from class_user import User debug("---------------------------- create_user -----------------------------\n") err = "%(code)s%(description)s" user = User.current() args = request.arguments if user is None: err = err%{"code":"5", "description":md5("1").hexdigest()} session["response"] = err if "xml_data" in args: data = request.arguments["xml_data"] """ login md5(password) """ from xml.dom.minidom import parseString dom_param = parseString(data.encode("UTF-8")) login = dom_param.getElementsByTagName("login") if login and login[0].firstChild: login = login[0].firstChild.nodeValue user = User() if user.get_by_email(login) is None: user.email = login password = dom_param.getElementsByTagName("password") password = password[0].firstChild.nodeValue user.password = password user.guid = str(uuid4()) user.save() else: err = err%{"code":"20", "description":"USER EXISTS"} session["response"] = err res = """ %(guid)s %(login)s %(photo_url)s """ % {"guid" : user.guid, "login" : user.email, "photo_url" : "http://picture"} session["response"] = res else: err = err%{"code":"14", "description":"xml_data is absent"} session["response"] = err except Exception, e: import traceback er = traceback.format_exc() debug("Error: "+ str(er )) err = err%{"code":"0", "description":"Server error:"+str(er)} session["response"] = err

request.arguments["xml_data"] """ guid folder field1 int 10 field2 list invoice invoice,document,order """ from xml.dom.minidom import parseString dom_param = parseString(data.encode("UTF-8")) parent_doc_share = None parent_guid = dom_param.getElementsByTagName("parent_guid") if parent_guid and parent_guid[0].firstChild: parent_guid = parent_guid[0].firstChild.nodeValue parent_folder = Folder.get_by_guid(parent_guid) if parent_folder is None: err = err%{"code":"24", "description":"parent_folder is None"} session["response"] = err elif user.has_write_access_into(parent_folder) == False: err = err%{"code":"8", "description":"can not write into share"} session["response"] = err else: #request.session.value("response","Error: Wrong in share_guid") err = err%{"code":"9", "description":"Wrong in share_guid"} session["response"] = err new_share_name = "" name = dom_param.getElementsByTagName("name") if name and name[0].firstChild: new_share_name = name[0].firstChild.nodeValue else: err = err%{"code":"10", "description":"Wrong in 'name'"} session["response"] = err metafields = dom_param.getElementsByTagName("field") new_share = Document_share() new_share.name = new_share_name new_share.create() parent_folder.add_document_share(new_share) if metafields: for meta in metafields: m_name = meta.getElementsByTagName("name")[0] m_type = meta.getElementsByTagName("type")[0] m_default = meta.getElementsByTagName("default")[0] m_const = meta.getElementsByTagName("constraints")[0] m_new = Metafield() m_new.name = m_name.firstChild and m_name.firstChild.nodeValue or "field_1" m_type = m_type.firstChild and m_type.firstChild.nodeValue or "text" m_new.type_id = type_id[m_type] if m_type in type_id.keys() else "1" m_new.default = else: response.redirect("/File_server.vdom")

args = request.arguments config = VDOM_config() loc = localization.get_lang()
args_create = ["f_email","f_pass","f_passconf"] license_igree = VDOM_CONFIG_1[str(application.id)] if str(application.id) in VDOM_CONFIG_1 else "0"
self.btn_ok.text = loc["reg_iagree"] self.hpt_license.htmlcode = loc["reg_text"] self.form_admin.lbl_email.value = loc["reg_admin_mail"] self.form_admin.lbl_pass.value = loc["uag_pass"] self.form_admin.lbl_passconf.value = loc["uag_confirm"] self.form_admin.f_btn_init.label = loc["create"]
""" METHODS """ def popup_growl(_title, _msg): self.growl.title, self.growl.text, self.growl.active = _title, _msg, "1"
""" IMPLEMENTATION """ #popup_growl("ARGS", str(args))
# "Check license" # #raise Exception(str(VDOM_CONFIG_1)) if User.admin_exists():# or (license_igree == "1" and not User.admin_exists()): response.redirect("/home_page.vdom")
# "CREATE ADMIN" # if all(a in args and args[a] for a in args_create):
f_email = args["f_email"] f_pass = args["f_pass"] f_passconf = args["f_passconf"] try: if f_pass and f_pass == f_passconf: new_admin = User() new_admin.email = f_email new_admin.password = md5(f_pass).hexdigest() new_admin.set_as_admin()
config.set_opt_sync(str(application.id), "1") VDOM_CONFIG_1[str(application.id)] = "1"
response.redirect("/home_page.vdom") else: raise Exception("incorrect or empty password ") except Exception, e: popup_growl("ERROR",str(e))

import unittest from test_FileShare import Test_FileShare from test_ShareDir import Test_ShareDir from test_ShareFile import Test_ShareFile import cStringIO from helper import scalar from class_ShareFile import ShareFile args_list = { "file_share" : Test_FileShare, "share_dir" : Test_ShareDir, "share_file" : Test_ShareFile, } test_argument = scalar("test","") test_class = args_list[test_argument] if test_argument in args_list else "" """ upload = request.arguments["upload"] if upload: sf = ShareFile() sf.share_guid = "$share_guid" sf.parent_guid = "$parent_guid" sf.name = upload[1] sf.save(upload[0]) raise Exception(str(upload)) """ if test_class: outIO = cStringIO.StringIO() outIO.write(u"
")
	try:
		suite = unittest.TestLoader().loadTestsFromTestCase(test_class)
		unittest.TextTestRunner(stream = outIO, verbosity=2).run(suite)

	outIO.write(u"

Actions.Action: from helper import scalar, xml_error_response from class_xml_event import xml_event from engine_core import workflow_queue, global_log import managers from indexers import normalize from engine_core import global_log global_log.insert(0,u"WF_send_event action launched!") success_xml = "ok" xml_data = normalize(scalar("xml_data", "empty")) #request.arguments.get("xml_data", "empty") try: if xml_data == "empty": session["response"] = xml_error_response("02","xml_data") elif not xml_data: session["response"] = xml_error_response("03","xml_data", xml_data) else: event = xml_event(xml_data) workflow_queue.put(event) global_log.append("Event logs: workflow was put") session["response"] = success_xml except Exception, e: session["response"] = xml_error_response("13")

""" Upload file into workflow (post): command : fileUpload top_level_share_guid : %top_folder_guid% parent_dir_guid : %parent_guid% files["upload"] Download file from workflow (post): command : fileDownload file_guid : %file_guid% Modify file for a workflow (post): command : fileModify file_guid : %file_guid% files["upload"] """ from class_user import User from class_share_file import ShareFile from class_share_dir import ShareDir from helper import xml_error_response import traceback from engine.exceptions import RenderTermination from engine_core import global_log global_log.insert(0,u"API_W action launched!") file_xml = "%(guid)s" user = User.current() global_log.insert(0,u"-------->> %s"%user.email) args = request.arguments command = args.get("command") global_log.insert(0,u"-------->> %s"%command) parent_dir = args.get("parent_dir_guid", castto = ShareDir.get_by_guid) share_file = args.get("file_guid", castto = ShareFile.get_by_guid) global_log.insert(0,u"-------->> %s"%share_file.name if share_file else "not found share_file") upload = args.get("upload", u"", castto=Attachment)#obsolete_request.arguments.get("upload","") if user: try: if command in ['fileDownload', 'fileModify']: if not share_file: response.write(xml_error_response("03", "file_guid", args.get("file_guid"))) elif command == 'fileDownload': if user.can(user.rules["SEE"], share_file.guid): global_log.insert(0,u"Downloading %s"%share_file.name ) share_file.download() # FINISH of DOWNLOADING global_log.insert(0,u"Downloaded!") else: response.write(xml_error_response("04","User don't have 'see' access to current file")) else: share_file.save(upload.handler) response.write("ok") # FINISH of MODIFYING a file elif command == 'fileUpload': if not parent_dir: response.write(xml_error_response("03", "parent_dir_guid", args.get("parent_dir_guid"))) elif not upload: response.write(xml_error_response("03", "upload", obsolete_request.arguments.get("upload",""))) else: sf = ShareFile() sf.parent_guid = parent_dir.guid # if parent_dir else file_share.guid sf.name = upload.name.decode("utf8") # filename sf.save(upload.handler) # file handler top_folder = parent_dir.top_folder top_folder.copy_acls_to(sf) res = file_xml%{"guid":str(sf.guid)} response.write(res, False) # FINISH of UPLOADING else: response.write(xml_error_response("03", "command", args.get("command"))) except RenderTermination: #debug("error?") raise except Exception, e: response.write(xml_error_response("13")) else: response.write(xml_error_response("00"))

from class_workflow import Workflow from api_helper import create_success_doc, create_error_doc from xml.dom.minidom import parseString from xml.parsers.expat import ExpatError
args = request.arguments
try:
# parse input XML doc_in = parseString(request.arguments["xml_data"])
# check workflow name guid_tags = doc_in.getElementsByTagName("guid") if not (guid_tags and guid_tags[0].firstChild): raise Exception("Workflow GUID is not specified")
# get workflow wf_guid = guid_tags[0].firstChild.nodeValue workflow = Workflow.get_by_guid(wf_guid) if not workflow: raise Exception("No workflow with such GUID")
# create an output XML doc doc_out = create_success_doc()
#workflow = doc_asdf
# get workflow source element source = parseString(workflow.source.encode("utf8")) wf_source = source.documentElement doc_out.documentElement.appendChild(wf_source)
# return 'success' session["response"] = doc_out.toxml()
except ExpatError: session["response"] = create_error_doc("XML parsing error").toxml() except Exception as e: session["response"] = create_error_doc(str(e)).toxml()

from xml.dom.minidom import Document, parseString from class_workflow import Workflow from api_helper import create_success_doc from helper import scalar, xml_error_response
def create_workflow_node(workflow): """ returns a <workflow> node filled with a specified workflow object's data """
# extract workflow 'label' workflow_label = u"" if workflow.source.strip(): doc_source = parseString(workflow.source) workflow_label = doc_source.documentElement.attributes["label"].value
# establish doc for creating <workflow> elements doc = Document()
# create <workflow> element wf = doc.createElement("workflow") wf.setAttribute("guid", workflow.guid) wf.setAttribute("name", workflow.name) wf.setAttribute("label", workflow_label)
# create <description> element descr = doc.createElement("description") wf.appendChild(descr)
# set <description> data descr_data = doc.createCDATASection(workflow.description) descr.appendChild(descr_data)
# return <workflow> element return wf
try: # create an output XML doc doc = create_success_doc()

Output:
Success: <success>workflow modified successfully<success> Error: <error>...</error>
"""
from class_workflow import Workflow from api_helper import create_success_doc, create_error_doc from xml.dom.minidom import parseString from xml.parsers.expat import ExpatError
args = request.arguments
try: # parse input XML doc = parseString(request.arguments["xml_data"])
# get GUID guid_elems = doc.getElementsByTagName("guid") if not (guid_elems and guid_elems[0].firstChild): raise Exception("GUID is not specified")
# get source workflow_elems = doc.getElementsByTagName("workflow") if not (workflow_elems and workflow_elems[0].firstChild): raise Exception("Workflow source is not specified")
# get image image_elems = doc.getElementsByTagName("image") if not (image_elems and image_elems[0].firstChild): raise Exception("Workflow image is not specified")
# get description descr_elems = doc.getElementsByTagName("description")
# get input data wf_guid = guid_elems[0].firstChild.nodeValue # wf_name = workflow_elems[0].attributes["name"].value # wf_description = descr_elems[0].firstChild.nodeValue if descr_elems[0].firstChild else "" wf_source = workflow_elems[0].toxml() wf_image = image_elems[0].firstChild.nodeValue
# get workflow wf = Workflow.get_by_guid(wf_guid) if not wf: raise Exception("No workflow with such GUID")
# modify workflow # wf.name = wf_name # wf.description = wf_description wf.source = wf_source wf.image = wf_image wf.modified = True wf.save()
# return 'success' session["response"] = create_success_doc("workflow modified successfully").toxml() print str("123") except ExpatError as e: session["response"] = create_error_doc("XML parsing error").toxml() print str(e) except Exception as e: session["response"] = create_error_doc(str(e)).toxml() print str(e)

""" * Creates new workflow *
Input:
<input_data> <workflow name="NewWorkflow" label="New Workflow" timeout="true" delay="0:0:0:0" version="1.0"> <description><![CDATA[ ... ]] ></description> <folders topLevel="Workflow" autoCreate="true"/> <graph> <steps> ... </steps> <transitions> ... </transitions> </graph> </workflow> <image><![CDATA[4578dgjlsdaghjkgfh894576 ] ] > </image> <compilable>True</compilable> </input_data>
Output:
Success: <success> <guid>74c76f30-18d6-42f5-9b60-649a4473b669</guid> <success>
Error: <error>...</error>
"""
from class_workflow import Workflow from class_share_dir import ShareDir from api_helper import create_success_doc, create_error_doc from xml.dom.minidom import parseString from xml.parsers.expat import ExpatError
args = request.arguments
def process_folders(top_folder_name, folder_names, auto_create):
# find out what folders are missing top_folder_is_missing = not bool(ShareDir.get_top_by_name(top_folder_name)) if top_folder_is_missing: missing_folder_names = folder_names else: top_folder = ShareDir.get_top_by_name(top_folder_name) missing_folder_names = [fname for fname in folder_names if not ShareDir.get_by_name(top_folder, fname)]
# process missing folders if (top_folder_is_missing or missing_folder_names) and not auto_create: raise Exception("Some folders used by workflow are missing and autoCreateFolders param is not set")
if auto_create_folders: top_folder = create_folder(top_folder_name) if top_folder_is_missing else top_folder
for fname in missing_folder_names: create_folder(fname, top_folder)
def create_folder(name, parent_folder=None): folder = ShareDir() folder.name = name folder.parent_guid = parent_folder.guid if parent_folder else "" return folder.save()
def create_workflow(name, description, image, source): wf = Workflow() # wf.name = name # wf.description = description wf.source = source wf.image = image wf.modified = True return wf.save()
try:
# get elements doc_in = parseString(request.arguments["xml_data"].encode("utf-8"))
workflow_elems = doc_in.getElementsByTagName("workflow") if not (workflow_elems and workflow_elems[0].firstChild): raise Exception("Workflow source is not specified")
image_elems = doc_in.getElementsByTagName("image") if not (image_elems and image_elems[0].firstChild): raise Exception("Workflow image is not specified")
descr_elems = doc_in.getElementsByTagName("description") elem_folders = workflow_elems[0].getElementsByTagName("folders")[0] elems_folder = workflow_elems[0].getElementsByTagName("folder")
# handle folders top_folder_name = elem_folders.attributes["topLevelFolder"].value folder_names = [ef.attributes["name"].value for ef in elems_folder] auto_create_folders = True if elem_folders.attributes["autoCreateFolders"].value == "true" else False
process_folders(top_folder_name, folder_names, auto_create_folders)
# create workflow wf = create_workflow( name=workflow_elems[0].attributes["name"].value, description=descr_elems[0].firstChild.nodeValue if descr_elems[0].firstChild else "", source=workflow_elems[0].toxml(), image=image_elems[0].firstChild.nodeValue )
# create output doc doc_out = create_success_doc()
# create <guid> elem elem_guid = doc_out.createElement("guid") doc_out.documentElement.appendChild(elem_guid)
# set guid value node_guid = doc_out.createTextNode(wf.guid) elem_guid.appendChild(node_guid)
# return 'success' session["response"] = doc_out.toxml()
except ExpatError: session["response"] = create_error_doc("XML parsing error").toxml() except Exception as e: session["response"] = create_error_doc(str(e)).toxml()

""" List all workflows for current user INPUT: "<listWorkflows/>" OUTPUT: ''' <workflows> <workflow> <id>guid</id> <name>Translation</name> <status>active</status> <folders> <folder> <id>guid</id> <name>FaxIn</name> </folder> <folder> <id>guid</id> <name>FaxOut</name> </folder> </folders> </workflow> <workflow> ... </workflow> </workflows>
''' """
WF_FORMAT = """ <workflow> <id>%(id)s</id> <name>%(name)s</name> <folders>%(folders)s</folders> <status>%(status)s</status> </workflow>""" FOLDER_FORMAT = """ <folder> <id>%(id)s</id> <name>%(name)s</name> </folder> """ STATUS = ["stopped","pause","active"]
from class_workflow import Workflow from class_share_dir import ShareDir from xml.dom.minidom import parseString from xml.parsers.expat import ExpatError from helper import scalar, xml_error_response
try: xml_data = request.arguments.get("xml_data", "empty", str) #scalar("xml_data", "empty") if xml_data == "empty": session["response"] = xml_error_response("02","xml_data") elif not xml_data: session["response"] = xml_error_response("03","xml_data", xml_data) else: data = xml_data.encode("utf8") if data.strip() not in ['<listWorkflows/>','<listWorkflows></listWorkflows>']: session["response"] = xml_error_response("03","xml_data", xml_data) else: workflows = Workflow.all()
from StringIO import StringIO result = StringIO() result.write("<workflows>")
for wf in workflows: dirs = wf.folders folders_str = ""
for dir in dirs: if not isinstance(dir, ShareDir): continue folders_str += FOLDER_FORMAT % { "id" : dir.guid, "name" : dir.name }
result.write( WF_FORMAT % { "id" : wf.guid, "name" : wf.name, "status" : STATUS[int(wf.status)], "folders" : folders_str, } ) result.write("\n</workflows>") debug("-----------------> AFTER")
session["response"] = result.getvalue() result.close() except Exception, e: # raise debug(xml_error_response("13")) session["response"] = xml_error_response("13")
session["response"] = "1"
session["response"] = "2"

''' incoming commands: [ error (1), run_compile, (2) design, (3) locked, (4) play_act, (5) play_dis, (6) pause_act, (7) pause_dis, (8) stop_act, (9) stop_dis (10) ] ''' from class_workflow import Workflow from class_workflow_instance import WorkflowInstance from helper import scalar, ssn_scalar, log_bugs from class_trace import Trace is_class = scalar("is_template") is_class = True if is_class=="True" else False workflow = scalar("wf_guid", castto=Workflow.get_by_guid if is_class else WorkflowInstance.get_by_guid ) or "workflow_id" command = scalar("command") wf_table = ssn_scalar("wf_table") selected_workflow = ssn_scalar("selected_workflow") refresh = False if not workflow: self.action("goTo",["/workflows.vdom"]) # WORKFLOW CLASS REQUESTS if is_class: # ERROR if command == "error": # open errors log dialog self.growl.action("show",["ERROR LOG","NOT IMPLEMENTED","red"]) # RUN_COMPILE elif command == "run_compile": # connect with engine, send source from workflow try: workflow.generate_class() workflow.modified = False workflow.save() refresh = True except Exception, e: self.growl.action("show",["COMPILE ERROR",str(e),"red"]) elif command == "design": # open designer for current workflow if workflow.status != 2: #workflow.modified = True #workflow.save() refresh = True #self.growl.action("show",["DESIGNER","NOT IMPLEMENTED","red"]) elif command == "locked": # workflow has been modified. To start the workflow it must be compiled self.growl.action("show",["LOCKED","Workflow has been modified. To start the workflow it must be compiled first!","red"]) # COMMON REQUESTS if command == "play_act": # click on active button - do nothing. self.growl.action("show",["PLAY BUTTON ACTIVE","DO NOTHING","red"]) elif command == "play_dis": # set workflow in active mode if possible if is_class and not workflow.modified: try: (activated, comment) = workflow.activate() if activated: refresh = True else: self.growl.action("show",["ACTIVATION ERROR",comment,"red"]) except Exception, e: self.growl.action("show",["ACTIVATION ERROR","Description: %s"%str(e),"red"]) elif not is_class and wf_guid=="workflow_id": import managers import threading, time try: from engine_core import engine thread1 = threading.Thread(target=engine.process_queue) thread1.start() managers.log_manager.info_bug("Workflow Engine was started", "EOF WF Engine") except: pass else: self.growl.action("show",["WORKFLOW LOCKED","You can't start the workflow until run the compilation.","red"]) elif command == "pause_act": # click on active button - do nothing. self.growl.action("show",["PAUSE BUTTON ACTIVE","DO NOTHING","red"]) elif command == "pause_dis": # pause workflow workflow.status = 1 workflow.save() refresh = True #self.growl.action("show",["PAUSE BUTTON DISABLE","WORKFLOW IS SET IN PAUSE MODE","red"]) elif command == "stop_act": # click on active button - do nothing. workflow.deactivate() refresh = True # self.growl.action("show",["STOP BUTTON ACTIVE","DO NOTHING","red"]) elif command == "stop_dis": # stop workflow workflow.deactivate() refresh = True #self.growl.action("show",["STOP BUTTON DISABLE","WORKFLOW IS SET IN STOP MODE","red"]) if refresh: self.action("goTo",["/workflows.vdom%s" % ("?selected=%s"%selected_workflow.guid) if selected_workflow else ""]) # try: # workflows = Workflow.all() # wf_table = WidgetWorkflowTable(self.dt_workflow, self.hpt_main_toolbar.id, False) # wf_table.set_data(workflows) # wf_table.render() # # session["wf_table"] = wf_table # log_bugs("--> session workflows") # except Exception, e: # import traceback # er = traceback.format_exc() # self.growl.action("show",["STOP BUTTON DISABLE",str(er),"red"])

# page title page_title = WidgetPageTitle(self) page_title.set_data("header_fs") page_title.render()
# title (main block) # widget_file_server.title_template(self.cnt_title.rtxt_title)
content_title = WidgetContentTitle(self.hpt_title) content_title.set_data( title_key = "fs_title" ) content_title.render()
# buttons correcting # widget_file_server.edit_buttons(handler=self.btn_addshare)
if not user.is_admin(): self.btn_addshare.visible = self.btn_addsmart.visible = "0" self.hpt_shares.top = "170" else: lang = session["lang"] btn_params = [ {"en":140, "ru":160, "fr":185}, {"en":160, "ru":200, "fr":245} ] widget_btn_add = WidgetButton(self.btn_addshare) widget_btn_add.set_data( title_key = "fs_addshare") widget_btn_add.icon = "add_share" widget_btn_add.text_color = "green" widget_btn_add.width = btn_params[0][lang] widget_btn_add.render()
widget_btn_add_smart = WidgetButton(self.btn_addsmart) widget_btn_add_smart.set_data( title_key = "fs_add_smartfolder") widget_btn_add_smart.icon = "add_share" widget_btn_add_smart.text_color = "green" widget_btn_add_smart.width = btn_params[1][lang] widget_btn_add_smart.render() self.btn_addsmart.left = {"en":420, "ru":440, "fr":465}[lang]
import localization loc = localization.get_lang()
self.d_rules.title = loc["acl_settings"]
self.d_addshare.form.rtxt_title_1.value = loc["fs_addshare"] self.d_addshare.form.rtxt_title_2.value = loc["fs_add_smartfolder"] self.d_addshare.form.btn_addshare_cancel.label = loc["cancel"] self.d_addshare.form.btn_addshare_create.label = loc["create"]
self.d_add_subject.cnt.tab.addgroup.title = loc["uag_groups"] self.d_add_subject.cnt.tab.adduser.title = loc["uag_users"]
# FileShares drawing widget_file_server.draw_file_share_folders(self.hpt_shares, user)

from class_ACL import ACL from class_user import User from class_group import Group from class_folder import Folder from html_wrapper import Html_wrapper from class_document_share import Document_share import utils_old from class_ACL_proxy import rules, ACL_record from file_access import share import localization, cgi user = User.current() args = request.arguments loc = localization.get_lang() self.title = loc["header_hgmb"] + " » " + loc["header_f"] if "mess" in args: message = args["mess"] self.growl2.title = loc["hp_errtitle"] self.growl2.text = loc[message] if message in loc else message # DOCUMENT_SHARE_IS_NOT_EMPTY self.growl2.active = "1" def set_parents_ACL(object): for acl in ACL.get_by_object(folder.guid): new_acl = ACL() new_acl.subject = acl.subject new_acl.object = object.guid new_acl.rule = acl.rule new_acl.save() if user: mess = "" if "guid" in args and args["guid"] !="" : obj="0bf6b912-d50b-44ae-af6e-dc0960a02cb9" subj="9da9f8c2-e4d1-4c47-8bfa-d5f10ef81466" #raise Exception(str([str(s) for s in ACL_record.get_acls(subj, obj)])) folder = args.get("guid", castto=Folder.get_by_guid) user_isadmin = user.is_admin() user_has_admin_access = user.can(rules["USER_ADMIN"],folder.guid) search_form = Html_wrapper.get_search_form(folder.guid) custom_search_link = u"""
%(s_custom)s """%{"guid":folder.guid, "s_custom" : loc["s_custom"]} self.hpt_search_form.htmlcode = search_form + custom_search_link if folder and user.can(rules["READ"], folder.guid): if "del_folder" in args and args["del_folder"] !="" : del_folder = args.get("del_folder", castto=Folder.get_by_guid) if del_folder: del_folder.set_xapy_access(self.connector, self.search) try: del_folder.delete() except Exception, e: mess = "&mess="+str(e) response.redirect("/Folder.vdom?guid="+ folder.guid+mess) elif "new_folder" in args and args["new_folder"] !="" and user_has_admin_access: new_folder_name = args.get("new_folder") new_folder = Folder() new_folder.name = new_folder_name new_folder.parent_guid = folder.guid new_folder.save() if "setacl" in args: set_parents_ACL(new_folder) if not user_isadmin: user.add_access_to(new_folder, ACL.rules["USER_ADMIN"]) response.redirect("/Folder.vdom?guid="+ folder.guid) elif "new_share" in args and args["new_share"] !="" and user_has_admin_access: #cÐ¾Ð·Ð´Ð°ÑÑ ÑÐ°ÑÑ, Ð¸ Ð´Ð¾Ð±Ð°Ð²Ð¸ÑÑ ÐµÐµ Ð² ÑÐ¾Ð»Ð´ÐµÑ new_share = args.get("new_share") doc_share = Document_share() doc_share.name = new_share doc_share.create() if doc_share: folder.add_document_share(doc_share, user) if "setacl" in args: set_parents_ACL(doc_share) if not user_isadmin: user.add_access_to(doc_share, ACL.rules["USER_ADMIN"]) response.redirect("/Document_share_edit.vdom?guid="+ doc_share.guid+"&parent="+folder.guid) elif "acl_type" in args: utils_old.execute_ACL(args, folder, "/Folder.vdom?guid=" + folder.guid ) if "del_doc_share" in args and args["del_doc_share"] !="": doc_share = args.get("del_doc_share", castto=Document_share.get_by_guid) if doc_share: doc_share.set_connector(self.connector) doc_share.set_search(self.search) try: doc_share.delete() except Exception, e: mess = "&mess="+str(e) response.redirect("/Folder.vdom?guid="+ folder.guid+ mess) edit = "" if user_has_admin_access: edit = u"""/Folder_edit.vdom?guid=%(guid)s"""%{"guid":folder.guid} back_url = Html_wrapper.get_back_url(folder.get_parent()) res = Html_wrapper.get_title(cgi.escape(folder.name), back_url , edit, folder.guid) folder_children = user.get_subfolders(folder) folder_doc_shares = user.get_documents_shares(folder) add_doc_share = "" if not folder_children : add_doc_share = u""" %(ds_newshare)s




""" % { "ds_newshare" : loc["ds_newshare"], "ds_getacl" : loc["ds_getacl"], "create" : loc["create"] } res += u"""""" add_folder = "" if not folder_doc_shares : add_folder = u""" %(ds_addfolder)s




""" % { "ds_addfolder" : loc["ds_addfolder"], "ds_getacl" : loc["ds_getacl"], "create" : loc["create"] } if user_has_admin_access: empty_folder = "" if add_folder and add_doc_share: empty_folder = u"""
%(ds_emptyfolder)s
""" % { "ds_emptyfolder" : loc["ds_emptyfolder"] } res += u"""%(empty_folder)s %(add_folder)s %(add_doc_share)s

"""%{ "add_folder":add_folder, "add_doc_share":add_doc_share, "empty_folder" : empty_folder } # self.hpt_acl.htmlcode = Html_wrapper.get_users_form(folder, "Folder.vdom") + "
"+ Html_wrapper.get_grops_form(folder, "Folder.vdom") for a_folder in folder_children: #if user.can_read_share(a_folder): edit_url = del_url = "" if user.can(rules["USER_ADMIN"], a_folder.guid): del_url = u""" """%{ "del_guid":a_folder.guid, "guid":folder.guid, "delete" : loc["delete"] } edit_url = u""" """%{ "guid":a_folder.guid, "edit" : loc["edit"]} file_url = u"/Folder.vdom?guid=" + a_folder.guid file_image = u""" """%{ "file_url":file_url, "src":"/732a2116-5368-4a8d-a2f1-e13ffcc827db.png", "desc":a_folder.name} res += u"""
%(file_image)s
%(edit_url)s %(del_url)s
"""%{"file_image":file_image, "guid":a_folder.guid, "name":cgi.escape(a_folder.name), "edit_url":edit_url, "del_url":del_url } rowcut = 0 for doc_shares in folder_doc_shares: #if user.can_read_share(doc_shares): edit_url = del_url = "" if user.can(rules["USER_ADMIN"], doc_shares.guid): del_url = u""" """%{ "del_guid":doc_shares.guid, "guid":folder.guid, "delete" : loc["delete"] } edit_url = u""" """%{ "guid":doc_shares.guid, "parent":folder.guid, "edit" : loc["edit"] } res += u"""
%(del_url)s %(edit_url)s
"""%{"guid":doc_shares.guid, "name":cgi.escape(doc_shares.name), "edit_url":edit_url, "del_url":del_url, "parent":folder.guid } rowcut += 1 if rowcut % 8 == 0: res += u"
" res += u"""""" #import Application self.hpt_data.htmlcode = res else: response.redirect("/Documents_share.vdom") else: response.redirect("/Documents_share.vdom") else: back_url = Html_wrapper.get_logout_back_url() response.redirect("/home_page.vdom?back_url="+back_url)

import localization from class_user import User from html_wrapper import Html_wrapper from class_ACL_proxy import rules from io import StringIO import cgi from class_smart_folder import SmartFolder, SmartSubFolder def popup_growl(title, message): self.growl.title = loc[title] if title in loc else title self.growl.text = loc[message] if message in loc else message self.growl.active = "1" user = User.current() args = request.arguments loc = localization.get_lang() self.title = loc["header_hgmb"] + " » " + loc["header_smart"] if not user: response.redirect("/home_page.vdom?back_url="+Html_wrapper.get_logout_back_url()) smart_folder = SmartFolder.get_by_guid(args["folder"]) if "folder" in args else None if not smart_folder: response.redirect("/File_server.vdom") if "new_folder" in args and args["new_folder"]: new_sub = SmartSubFolder() new_sub.name = args["new_folder"] new_sub.parent_guid = smart_folder.guid try: new_sub.save() except Exception, e: popup_growl("hp_errtitle", str(e)) if "delete" in args: del_sub_guid = args["delete"] del_sub = SmartSubFolder.get_by_guid(del_sub_guid) if del_sub: del_sub.delete() response.redirect("/smart_folder.vdom?folder=%s"%smart_folder.guid) if "folder_rename" in args and args["folder_rename"] and "rename" in args: ssf = SmartSubFolder.get_by_guid(args["rename"]) if ssf: new_name = args["folder_rename"] ssf.name = new_name try: ssf.save() except Exception, e: popup_growl("hp_errtitle", str(e)) if isinstance(smart_folder, SmartFolder): self.hpt_js.htmlcode = self.hpt_js.htmlcode % { "delete" : loc["delete"], "edit" : loc["edit"], "cancel" : loc["cancel"], "uag_delete_confirm": loc["uag_delete_confirm"], "uag_adduser" : loc["uag_adduser"], "uag_email" : loc["uag_email"], "uag_pass" : loc["uag_pass"], "uag_confirm" : loc["uag_confirm"], "create" : loc["create"], "uag_newgroup" : loc["uag_newgroup"], "fs_del_sub" : loc["fs_del_sub"], "fs_ren_sub" : loc["fs_ren_sub"], } new_folder_form = u"" if user.can(user.rules["USER_ADMIN"], smart_folder.guid): new_folder_form = res = u"""%(fs_addshare)s

""" % { "fs_addshare" : loc["fs_add_smartsubfolder"], # Add file share "create" : loc["create"] # Create } sub_folders = smart_folder.sub_folders subs_template = u"

    %s
" sub_folder_template = u"""
  • %(title)s %(edit)s %(delete)s
    • """ del_url = edit_url = u"" if user.can(user.rules["USER_ADMIN"], smart_folder.guid): del_url = u""" """ edit_url = u""" """ if sub_folders: subs = subs_template % "".join([ sub_folder_template % { "title" : cgi.escape(sub.name), "guid" : sub.guid , "delete": del_url % { "guid":sub.guid, "delete" : loc["delete"], "parent_guid" : smart_folder.guid, "title" : cgi.escape(sub.name)}, "edit" : edit_url % { "guid":sub.guid, "edit" : loc["edit"] , "parent_guid" : smart_folder.guid, "title" : cgi.escape(sub.name)} } for sub in sub_folders ]) else: subs = u"


    %s." % loc["fs_no_subfolders"] folder_edit_url = u"" if user.can(user.rules["USER_ADMIN"], smart_folder.guid): folder_edit_url = u""" """%{ "guid":smart_folder.guid, "edit" : loc["edit"]} result = StringIO() result.write( Html_wrapper.get_title(u"""%s - %s %s""" % (loc["header_smart"], smart_folder.guid, cgi.escape(smart_folder.name), folder_edit_url) )) #raise Exception(str(new_folder_form).replace("<", "<")) result.write(new_folder_form) result.write(subs) self.hpt_result.htmlcode = result.getvalue() result.close() else: response.redirect("/File_server.vdom")

import localization from class_user import User from html_wrapper import Html_wrapper from class_ACL_proxy import rules from io import StringIO import utils_old import cgi from class_smart_folder import SmartFolder, SmartSubFolder def popup_growl(title, message): self.growl.title = loc[title] if title in loc else title self.growl.text = loc[message] if message in loc else message self.growl.active = "1" user = User.current() args = request.arguments loc = localization.get_lang() self.title = loc["header_hgmb"] + " » " + loc["header_smart_edit"] if not user: response.redirect("/home_page.vdom?back_url="+Html_wrapper.get_logout_back_url()) smart_folder = SmartFolder.get_by_guid(args["guid"]) if "guid" in args else None if not smart_folder: response.redirect("/File_server.vdom") if isinstance(smart_folder, SmartFolder) and user.can(user.rules["USER_ADMIN"], smart_folder.guid): if "share_rename" in args and args["share_rename"]: orig = smart_folder.name smart_folder.name = args["share_rename"] try: smart_folder.save() except Exception, e: popup_growl("hp_errtitle", str(e)) smart_folder.name = orig if "del_acl" in args or "acl_type" in args: utils_old.execute_ACL(args, smart_folder, "/Smart_folder_edit.vdom?guid=" + smart_folder.guid) result = StringIO() result.write( Html_wrapper.get_title(u"""%s - %s""" % ( smart_folder.guid, loc["header_smart_edit"], smart_folder.guid, cgi.escape(smart_folder.name) ))) result.write( Html_wrapper.get_share_rename_form(smart_folder) ) result.write( Html_wrapper.get_users_form(smart_folder, "Smart_folder_edit.vdom", "") ) result.write( Html_wrapper.get_grops_form(smart_folder, "Smart_folder_edit.vdom", "") ) self.hpt_result.htmlcode = result.getvalue() result.close() else: response.redirect("/File_server.vdom")

from utilities import scalar import json from class_external_settings import LDAPConfig, SubjectSettings
base_dn = scalar( 'base_dn_' ) user_dn = scalar( 'user_dn' ) email = scalar( 'email' ) first_name = scalar( 'first_name' ) last_name = scalar( 'last_name' ) phone = scalar( 'phone' ) user_guid = scalar( 'user_guid' ) user_class = scalar( 'user_class' ) users_in_group = scalar( 'users_in_group' )
group_dn = scalar( 'group_dn' ) group_name = scalar( 'group_name' ) group_guid = scalar( 'group_guid' ) group_class = scalar( 'group_class' ) groups_in_user = scalar( 'groups_in_user' )
attributes = { "base_dn": base_dn, "user_dn": user_dn, "email": email, "first_name": first_name, "last_name": last_name, "phone": phone, "user_guid": user_guid, "user_class": user_class, "users_in_group": users_in_group, "group_dn": group_dn, "group_name": group_name, "group_guid": group_guid, "group_class": group_class, "groups_in_user": groups_in_user } config = LDAPConfig( attributes )
settings = SubjectSettings( config, base_dn ) if not settings.exist(): id = settings.save()
config = SubjectSettings.get_name_list() config.append( ["1", "create new config..."])
self.connection_form.datatable.data = json.dumps( config ) self.connection_form.datatable.render( config )
self.connection_form.config.value = id self.connection_form.config.render( id )

response.redirect("/documents_share.vdom")
from class_external_settings import SubjectSettings, ConnectionSettings import json

self.connection_form.datatable.data = json.dumps( subject_settings ) #([["1", "create new config"], ["aaa", "bbb"], ["a", "b"]]) #json.dumps( ExternalSettings.get_all_config() ) self.connection_form.datatable.render( subject_settings )
connection_settings = ConnectionSettings.get_list() if connection_settings: self.datatable.data = json.dumps( connection_settings ) self.datatable.render( connection_settings )

from utilities import scalar from class_external_settings import ConnectionSettings
config_id = str(scalar("keyList")).replace("]", "").replace("[", "") #raise Exception( config_id ) connection_settings = ConnectionSettings.get_by_id( config_id ) #raise Exception( connection_settings ) self.connection_form.server.value = connection_settings.server self.connection_form.login.value = connection_settings.login self.connection_form.password.value = connection_settings.password self.connection_form.config.value = connection_settings.config_id

from utilities import scalar from class_ldapconnection import LDAPConnection from class_external_subject import LDAPUser, LDAPGroup from class_external_settings import LDAPConfig, SubjectSettings, ConnectionSettings import json
server = scalar( 'server' ) user = scalar( 'login' ) password = scalar( 'password' ) config_id = scalar( 'config' )
#raise Exception( server, login, password, config )
if server and user and password and config_id: # raise Exception( connection )
config = SubjectSettings.get_by_id( config_id ) uid = config.get_attribute( 'user_guid' ) user_dn = config.get_attribute( 'user_dn' ) base_dn = config.get_attribute( 'base_dn' ) login = "%(uid)s=%(login)s,%(user_dn)s,%(base_dn)s" % {"uid": uid, "login": user, "user_dn": user_dn, "base_dn": base_dn} # raise Exception( login )
settings = ConnectionSettings( server, user, password, config_id ) if not settings.exist(): settings.save()
settings = ConnectionSettings.get_list()
self.datatable.data = json.dumps( settings ) self.datatable.render( settings )
connection = LDAPConnection( editable = True ) connection.bind( server, user, password )
# user = LDAPUser("masha", "masha", "sidorova", "masha@masha.com", 'masha', 'masha') # user.save( connection, config ) users = LDAPUser.get_users( connection, config ) groups = LDAPGroup.get_groups( connection, config ) raise Exception( [user.email for user in users] )
# raise Exception( users, groups )

from utilities import scalar
id = scalar( "keyList" ) id = str(id).replace("[", "").replace("]", "").replace('"', "")
#raise Exception( id )
if id == '1': # raise Exception( id ) self.connection_form.datatable.visible = "0" self.subject_config.visible = "1" self.datatable.visible = "0"
self.connection_form.config.value = id self.connection_form.config.render( id )

localization_dict = { #Don't forget to change DropToWeb and PrintToWeb connexion params 'APPLY_CHANGES_TO_P2W_D2W' : u"Don't forget to change DropToWeb and PrintToWeb connection params", 'ACCESS_DENIED' : u"Access denied", # Access denied 'HAVE_BEEN_UPDATED' : u"Have been updated", # Have been updated 'HAS_BEEN_UPDATED' : u"Has been updated", # Have been updated 'RULES_OF' : u"rules of", # rules of ... 'NO_LICENSE_ON_SMART_CARD' : u"No license. You have to update your smart card.", # No license. You have to update your smart card. 'NO_FILE_SELECTED' : u"No file(s) selected", # No file(s) selected 'ERROR_EMAIL_INVALID' : u"Invalid email address", #Invalid email address 'ERROR_EMAIL_EMPTY' : u"Input email address, please", #Input email address, please 'acl_empty' : u"No data have been found", # No data have been found 'acl_settings' : u"Properties", # Settings 'mf_folder' : u"folder", # folder 'html_archive' : u"Smart Folder", # Smart Folder 'html_sub-archive' : u"Sub-folder", # Sub-folder 'html_nosub_assign' : u"Sub-folder not found", # sub-folder not found 'html_nosub_found' : u"No sub-folder assigned", # no sub-folder assigned 'fs_add_smartfolder': u"Add smart folder",# Add smart folder 'fs_add_smartsubfolder': u"Add sub-folder",# Add sub-folder 'fs_no_subfolders' : u"No sub-folders", # No sub-folders 'header_smart' : u"Smart Folder", # Smart Folder 'header_smart_edit' : u"Smart Folder Editing", # Smart Folder Editing 'fs_del_sub' : u"Delete sub-folder", # Delete sub-folder 'fs_ren_sub' : u"Rename sub-folder", # Rename sub-folder 'SAME_NAME_ERROR_SMART_FOLDER' : u"Smart folder with such name already exists.", # 'NO_LICENSE' : u"No license. You have to update your smart card.", # 'fs_del_smart_title': u"Delete Smart folder", # Delete Smart folder # Are you sure you want to delete the following Smart folder(s) 'fs_del_smart_descr': u"Are you sure you want to delete the following Smart folder(s)", 'hdd_occupation' : u"Used Space", # Used Space 'user_header' : u"Profile", # Profile 'uag_delete_confirm': u"Are you sure?", 'uag_emailupdate' : u"Email has been updated", # Email has been updated 'uag_passwdupdate' : u"Password has been updated", # Password has been updated 'uag_first_name' : u"First Name", # First Name 'uag_last_name' : u"Last Name", # Last Name 'uag_keywords' : u"Keywords", # Keywords 'workflow_btn_title': u"Workflows", # Workflow 'workflow_import_wf' : u"Import workflow", # Import workflow 'workflow_export_wf' : u"Export workflow", # Export workflow 'workflow_new_wf' : u"New workflow", # New workflow 'workflow_delete_wf' : u"Delete workflow", # Delete workflow # search helper operators 'AND' : u""" word1 AND word2 matches documents which are matched by both of the subexpressions. """, 'OR' : u""" word1 OR word2 matches documents which are matched by either of the subexpressions. """, 'NOT' : u""" word1 NOT word2 matches documents which are matched by only the first subexpression. This can also be written as word1 AND NOT word2. """, 'XOR' : u""" word1 XOR word2 matches documents which are matched by one or other of the subexpressions, but not both. XOR is probably a bit esoteric. """, 'BRACKETS' : u""" You can control the precedence of the boolean operators using brackets. In the query
one OR two AND three
the AND takes precedence, so this is the same as
one OR (two AND three).
You can override the precedence using
(one OR two) AND three. """, '+AND-' : u""" A group of terms with some marked with + and - will match documents containing all of the + terms, but none of the - terms. Terms not marked with + or - contribute towards the document rankings. You can also use + and - on phrases and on bracketed expressions. """, 'PHRASES' : u""" A phrase surrounded with double quotes (" ") matches documents containing that exact phrase. Hyphenated words are also treated as phrases, as are cases such as filenames and email addresses (e.g. /etc/passwd or president@whitehouse.gov). """, 'NEAR' : u""" one NEAR two NEAR three
matches documents containing those words within 10 words of each other. You can set the threshold to n by using NEAR/n like so:
one NEAR/6 two. """, 'ADJ' : u""" ADJ is like NEAR but only matches if the words appear in the same order as in the query. So
one ADJ two ADJ three
matches documents containing those three words in that order and within 10 words of each other. You can set the threshold to n by using ADJ/n like so:
one ADJ/6 two. """, 'WILDCARDS' : u""" The QueryParser supports using a trailing '*' wildcard, which matches any number of trailing characters, so
wildc* would match
wildcard, wildcarded, wildcards, wildcat, wildcats, etc. """, #--------------------------------------# # Header 'header_hgmb' : u"Eye On Files", # Eye On Files 'header_help' : u"Help", # Help 'header_dse' : u"Document share edit", # Document share edit 'header_admin' : u"Administration", # Administration 'header_cleardb' : u"Clear DB", # Clear DB 'header_cs' : u"Custom search", # Custom search 'header_cse' : u"Custom search edit", # Custom search edit 'header_csacl' : u"Custom searches acl", # Custom searches acl 'header_ds' : u"Document share", # Document share 'header_dss' : u"Documents share", # Documents share 'header_fs' : u"File server", # File server 'header_fse' : u"File server edit", # File server edit 'header_fshv' : u"File share view", # File share view 'header_fshe' : u"File share edit", # File share edit 'header_f' : u"Folder", # Folder 'header_fe' : u"Folder edit", # Folder edit 'header_g' : u"Group", # Group 'header_hp' : u"Home Page", # Home Page 'header_ds_new' : u"New document share", # New document share 'header_u_new' : u"New User", # New User 'header_s' : u"Search", # Search 'header_ss' : u"Searches", # Searches 'header_u' : u"User", # User 'header_uag' : u"Users and groups", # Users and groups 'header_rp' : u"Reset Password", # Reset password 'header_sitemap' : u"Folder map", # Folder map 'header_register' : u"License agreement", # License agreement 'header_map_edit' : u"Document Share structure editing", # Document Share structure editing # Home Page 'hp_errtitle' : u"Error", # Error 'hp_errinput' : u"Incorrect login/password", # Incorrect login/password 'hp_restoretitle' : u"Reset Password", # Reset Password 'hp_email_login' : u"Email or Login:", # Email or Login: 'hp_next' : u"Next", # Next 'hp_hello' : u"Hello", # Hello # Instructions for reseting your password has been sent to your email. 'hp_sent' : u"Instructions for reseting your password has been sent to your email", 'hp_usernotexist' : u"User does not exist", # User does not exist 'hp_forgot' : u"Forgot password", # Forgot password 'hp_passchanged' : u"Password has been changed. ''' CRUD model class '''
###" IMPORTS "### from class_db import Database
###" GLOBALS "###
# below is a RELEVANT database template tables = { 'acl' : ["id","subject","object","rule"], 'share_file' : ["id","parent_guid","guid","name","path","is_dir"], 'workflow_library' : ["id","name","source","description"], 'workflow' : ["id","name","description","status","modified","error","source", "guid","image","folder", "compilable"], 'workflow_instance' : ["id","workflow_guid","author_guid","current_user_guid","document_guid","guid","status","state"], 'smart_sub_folder' : ["id","parent_guid", "guid", "name"], 'smart_folder' : ["id", "guid", "name"],
} exceptions = ["order_by","limit","offset"]
class CRUD:
@staticmethod def validate_args(to_check, table_name): if not table_name in tables: raise Exception( "Wrong table name. Current relevant table names: %s" % ", ".join(tables.keys()) ) if not all( str(key) in tables[table_name] or str(key) in exceptions for key in to_check.keys() ): raise Exception( "Wrong arguments. Check spelling: %s" % ", ".join(tables[table_name]) )
return True
@staticmethod def create(table_name, **kwargs): CRUD.validate_args(kwargs, table_name) query = """ INSERT INTO `%(table_name)s`(%(inputs)s) VALUES(%(values)s) """ values = "" inputs = "" query_parse = []
if any(a in kwargs.keys() and kwargs[a] for a in tables[table_name][1:]): args = [ [k,v] for k,v in kwargs.iteritems()] inputs = ", ".join([k[0] for k in args]) values = ", ".join(["?" for k in args]) query_parse = tuple( [k[1] for k in args] )
query = query % { "table_name" : table_name, "inputs" : inputs, "values" : values } id = Database.maindb().commit(query, query_parse) return id
@staticmethod def retrieve(table_name, **kwargs): CRUD.validate_args(kwargs, table_name) query = """ SELECT * FROM `%(table_name)s` %(conditions)s %(order_by)s %(limit)s %(offset)s""" values = "" order_by = "" query_parse = []
order_by = kwargs["order_by"] if "order_by" in kwargs and kwargs["order_by"] in tables[table_name] else "" order_by = "ORDER BY %s.%s" % (table_name, order_by) if order_by else "" limit = kwargs["limit"] if "limit" in kwargs else "" limit = "LIMIT %s" % limit if (limit != "") else "" offset = kwargs["offset"] if "offset" in kwargs else "" if "offset" in kwargs and "limit" not in kwargs: raise Exception("OFFSET must be with LIMIT parameter.") offset = "OFFSET %s" % offset if (offset != "" and limit != "") else ""
if any(a in kwargs.keys() for a in tables[table_name]): for k,v in kwargs.iteritems(): kwargs[k] = v if v.__class__==list else [v]
args = dict([k,"%s.%s=?" % (table_name, k)] for k in tables[table_name])
where_args= [] for key in args.keys(): if key in kwargs.keys(): temp = [] for value in kwargs[key]: temp.append(args[key]) query_parse.append(value) where_args.append( "(%s)"%" or ".join(temp) )
values = "WHERE %s" % " and ".join(where_args)
query = query % { "table_name" : table_name, "conditions" : values, "order_by" : order_by, "limit" : limit, "offset" : offset } query_parse = tuple(query_parse) rows = Database.maindb().fetch_all(query, query_parse) return rows
@staticmethod def retrieve_one(table_name, **kwargs): CRUD.validate_args(kwargs, table_name) query = """ SELECT * FROM `%(table_name)s` %(conditions)s %(order_by)s""" values = "" order_by = "" query_parse = []
if any(a in kwargs.keys() for a in tables[table_name]): for k,v in kwargs.iteritems(): kwargs[k] = v if v.__class__==list else [v]
args = dict([k,"%s.%s=?" % (table_name, k)] for k in tables[table_name])
where_args= [] for key in args.keys(): if key in kwargs.keys(): temp = [] for value in kwargs[key]: temp.append(args[key]) query_parse.append(value) where_args.append( "(%s)"%" or ".join(temp) )
values = "WHERE %s" % " and ".join(where_args) order_by = kwargs["order_by"] if "order_by" in kwargs and kwargs["order_by"] in tables[table_name] else "" order_by = "ORDER BY %s.%s" % (table_name, order_by) if order_by else ""
query = query % { "table_name" : table_name, "conditions" : values, "order_by" : order_by } query_parse = tuple(query_parse)
row = Database.maindb().fetch_one(query, query_parse) return row
@staticmethod def update(table_name, where_args={}, **kwargs): CRUD.validate_args(kwargs, table_name) CRUD.validate_args(where_args, table_name) query = """ UPDATE `%(table_name)s` SET %(values)s %(conditions)s """ values = "" conditions = "" query_parse = []
if any(a in kwargs.keys() and kwargs[a] for a in tables[table_name][1:]): args = [[k,v] for k,v in kwargs.iteritems()] values = "%s"%", ".join(["%s = ?" % k[0] for k in args]) query_parse = [k[1] for k in args]
if where_args: args = [[k,v] for k,v in where_args.iteritems()] conditions = "WHERE %s"%", ".join(["%s = ?" % k[0] for k in args]) for k in args: query_parse.append(k[1])
query = query % { "table_name" : table_name, "conditions" : conditions, "values" : values } query_parse = tuple(query_parse)
row = Database.maindb().commit(query, query_parse) return row
@staticmethod def delete(table_name, **kwargs): CRUD.validate_args(kwargs, table_name) query = """ DELETE FROM %(table_name)s %(conditions)s """ conditions = "" query_parse = []
if any(a in kwargs.keys() for a in tables[table_name]): for k,v in kwargs.iteritems(): kwargs[k] = v if v.__class__==list else [v]
args = dict([k,"%s.%s=?" % (table_name, k)] for k in tables[table_name])
where_args= [] for key in args.keys(): if key in kwargs.keys() and kwargs[key]: temp = [] for value in kwargs[key] : temp.append(args[key]) query_parse.append(value) where_args.append( "(%s)"%" or ".join(temp) )
conditions = "WHERE %s" % " and ".join(where_args)
query = query % { "table_name" : table_name, "conditions" : conditions } query_parse = tuple(query_parse) row = Database.maindb().commit(query ,query_parse) return row

class Test_FileShare( unittest.TestCase ):
#@unittest.skip("") def test_000_db_backup(self): # here 2 methods are checked: all() and delete().

def test_001_saving(self): # generate dict for FileShare objects global kw kw = dict(["Share_%0.2i" % i, str(uuid4())] for i in range(count))
for k,v in sorted(kw.items()): fs = FileShare() fs.name = k fs.guid = v fs.save()
file_shares = FileShare.all() self.assertEqual(len(file_shares), count) # check new shares
for fs in file_shares: fs.name = "%s - %s" % (fs.name, "updated") fs.save()
file_shares = FileShare.all() self.assertEqual(len(file_shares), count) # check if there is still same updated shares
def test_002_retrieving(self): # method all() seems working fine, so skip it here global kw
fs_guid = random.choice(kw.values()) fs = FileShare.get_by_guid(fs_guid) self.assertEqual(fs_guid, fs.guid) # same guids
fs_id = fs.id fs = None fs = FileShare.get_by_id(fs_id) self.assertEqual(fs_id, fs.id) # same ids
fs = FileShare.all(limit=5) self.assertEqual(len(fs), 5) # correct limit
fs = FileShare.all(limit=8, offset=6) self.assertEqual(len(fs), 8) # correct limit & offset self.assertEqual(fs[0].name, "Share_%0.2i - updated" % 6) # correct offset
try: fs = FileShare.all(offset=10) self.assertTrue(False) # if launced: incorrect except: self.assertTrue(True) # should be launched
