  %s
""" % sd.name def file_string_format(sf): return """
  %s
""" % sf.name

from class_share_dir import ShareDir import cgi class WidgetShareFileTitle: TITLE_FORMAT = """ %(current_dir)s %(tree)s / %(root)s """ CURRENT_DIR = u""" %(title)s """ TREE_SEPARATOR = u" / " TREE_ELEMENT = u""" %(title)s """ ROOT_ELEMENT = u"""%s""" EDIT_FILE_SHARE_LINK = """ """ def __init__(self, vdom_html): self.__vdom_html = vdom_html self.__user = None # not Null self.__parent_dir = None def set_data(self, user, parent_dir): self.__user = user self.__parent_dir = parent_dir def render(self): from localization import get_lang loc = get_lang() root = loc["fs_title"] parent_dir = self.__parent_dir tree = [ self.CURRENT_DIR % { "title":cgi.escape(self.__parent_dir.name), "share_guid" : self.__parent_dir.top_folder.guid, "parent_guid" : self.__parent_dir.guid }] while parent_dir.parent: parent_dir = parent_dir.parent tree.append( self.TREE_ELEMENT % { "title":cgi.escape(parent_dir.name), "share_guid" : parent_dir.top_folder.guid, "parent_guid" : parent_dir.guid }) # now current parent_dir should be top folder if parent_dir.is_top_folder: user_can_admin = self.__user.can(self.__user.rules['USER_ADMIN'], parent_dir.guid) edit_link = self.EDIT_FILE_SHARE_LINK % { "guid" : parent_dir.guid, "edit" : loc["edit"] } if user_can_admin else "" tree[-1] = edit_link + " " + tree[-1] tree.append( self.ROOT_ELEMENT % root ) self.__vdom_html.htmlcode = u"""
%s
""" % self.TREE_SEPARATOR.join(tree)

class WidgetPermissionsDialog: def __init__(self, dialog=None, vdom_html=None, btn_submit=None, btn_cancel=None, btn_add_acl=None, btn_rename=None): self.__dialog = dialog # * self.__vdom_html = vdom_html # * self.__btn_submit = btn_submit # * self.__btn_cancel = btn_cancel # * self.__btn_add_acl = btn_add_acl# * self.__btn_rename = btn_rename self.__users = [] self.__groups = [] def set_data(self, users, groups): self.__users = users self.__groups = groups def render(self): import localization loc = localization.get_lang() EMPTY_DATA_HEADER_FORMAT = u""" %s """%loc["acl_empty"] GROUP_HEADER_FORMAT = u""" %s:
""" % loc["uag_groups"] GROUP_STR_FORMAT = u""" %(group_name)s 
""" USER_HEADER_FORMAT = u"""%s:
""" % loc["uag_users"] USER_STR_FORMAT = u""" %(user_email)s 
""" users_str = u"".join([ USER_STR_FORMAT % { "user_email" : unicode(user.email), "user_guid" : str(user.guid), "is_group" : "0" } for user in self.__users ]) or u"" groups_str = u"".join([ GROUP_STR_FORMAT % { "group_name" : group.name, "group_guid" : str(group.guid), "is_group" : "1" } for group in self.__groups ]) or u"" result = u"""%(empty_data_header)s%(groups_header)s %(groups)s %(users_header)s %(users)s""" % { "empty_data_header" : EMPTY_DATA_HEADER_FORMAT if not (self.__groups or self.__users) else "", "groups_header" : GROUP_HEADER_FORMAT if self.__groups else "", "users_header" : USER_HEADER_FORMAT if self.__users else "", "groups" : groups_str, "users" : users_str } self.__btn_submit.action("setText", [loc["save"]]) self.__btn_cancel.action("setText", [loc["cancel"]]) self.__btn_add_acl.action("setText", [u"+ %s"%loc["uag_addrule"]]) if self.__btn_rename: self.__btn_rename.action("setLabel", [loc["ds_change"]]) self.__vdom_html.action("setHTML",[result]) #self.__dialog.action("show",[300])

from xml.dom.minidom import Document
def create_success_doc(success_txt=None): """ returns an XML document with an <success> base element filled with a specified 'success_text' """
# create a minidom document doc = Document()
# create <success> base element success = doc.createElement("success") doc.appendChild(success)
# set 'success' text if success_txt is not None: txt = doc.createTextNode(success_txt) success.appendChild(txt)
return doc
def create_error_doc(error_txt): """ returns an XML document with an <error> base element filled with a specified 'error_text' """
# create a minidom document doc = Document()
# create <error> base element error = doc.createElement("error") doc.appendChild(error)
# set <error> text error_txt = doc.createTextNode(error_txt) error.appendChild(error_txt)
return doc
#def decode_cdata_entry(str): # return str.replace("<![CDATA[", "").replace("]]" + ">", "")

from xml.dom.minidom import parseString from StringIO import StringIO import engine_templates as wf_templates from utils.uuid import uuid4 import re class Workflow_generator(object): def __init__(self): self.parse_step_map = {"start":self.parse_start, "documentEvent":self.parse_event, "move": self.parse_move, "stop":self.parse_stop,"gateway":self.parse_gateway, "users":self.parse_users, "archive": self.parse_archive, "notification":self.parse_notification, "script":self.parse_scripting} self.parse_transition_map = {"automatic":self.parse_automatic, "conditional":self.parse_conditional, "error":self.parse_error,"timeout":self.parse_timeout} self.folder_listeners = {} step_scripting_regexp = re.compile("\$\((\w+)\)")
def generate_from_file(self, file_name): return self.generate(open(file_name, "r").read())
def generate(self, xmlbody): wf_class = StringIO() dom = parseString(xmlbody) workflow = dom.getElementsByTagName("workflow")[0] self.wf_name = workflow.getAttribute("name") class_body = StringIO() init_code = "" steplist = [] transitionlist = {} finalsteps = [] step_init = "" initial_event = "" for step in workflow.getElementsByTagName("steps")[0].childNodes: if step.nodeType != dom.TEXT_NODE: name, step_type, code = self.parse_step_map[step.tagName](step) class_body.write(code) steplist.append((name,step_type)) if step_type == "start": step_init = name elif step_type == "stop": finalsteps.append(name) for transition in workflow.getElementsByTagName("transitions")[0].childNodes: if transition.nodeType != dom.TEXT_NODE: name, step_type, source_step,connected_step, code = self.parse_transition_map[transition.tagName](transition) class_body.write(code) if source_step not in transitionlist: transitionlist[source_step] = [] transitionlist[source_step].append(name) if source_step == step_init: initial_event = connected_step
start_folder = self.folder_listeners[initial_event]
wf_class.write(wf_templates.class_template.format(**{"wf_name":self.wf_name, "initial_folder":start_folder[0],"initial_operation":start_folder[1], "init_code":init_code, "step_init":step_init,"steplist":self.gen_steplist(steplist), "transitionlist":self.gen_transitionlist(transitionlist),"finalsteps":self.gen_finalsteps(finalsteps), "wf_body":class_body.getvalue()})) result = wf_class.getvalue() wf_class.close() from engine_core import global_log global_log.insert(0, result)
return result
def parse_attributes(self, stepNode, attr_map): for attribute in stepNode.getElementsByTagName("attribute"): attr_name = attribute.getAttribute("name") if attr_name in attr_map and attribute.childNodes: if attr_name == "variable": value = self.parse_variable(attribute) else: value = attribute.childNodes[0].nodeValue if value == "false": value = False elif value == "true": value = True elif value.find("$(")!=-1: value = self.compile_scripting(value) else: value = '\"\"\"%s\"\"\"'%value attr_map[attr_name] = value
def parse_variable(self, attribute_node): declaration = "" for variable in attribute_node.getElementsByTagName("variable"): var_name = variable.getAttribute("name") var_value = variable.childNodes[0].nodeValue declaration+= ", \"%s\" : \"%s\""%(var_name,var_value) return "{%s}"%declaration[1:]
def parse_start(self, stepNode): attr_map = {"log":False, "variable":None} self.parse_attributes(stepNode,attr_map) name = stepNode.getAttribute("name") step_type = stepNode.tagName code = wf_templates.start_step.format(step_name = name,**attr_map) return name, step_type, code
def parse_event(self, stepNode): attr_map = {"log":False, "extractContent":None, "folder":None, "eventType":None} self.parse_attributes(stepNode,attr_map) name = stepNode.getAttribute("name") step_type = stepNode.tagName code = wf_templates.event_step.format(step_name = name,**attr_map) self.folder_listeners[name] = (attr_map["folder"],attr_map["eventType"]) return name, step_type, code
def parse_move(self, stepNode): attr_map = {"log":False, "document":None,"from":None,"to":None,"setRightsToFile":None,"users":None,"keepCopyOfFile":None,"keepVersionSource":None,"keepVersionTarget":None} self.parse_attributes(stepNode,attr_map) name = stepNode.getAttribute("name") step_type = stepNode.tagName code = wf_templates.move_step.format(step_name = name,**attr_map) return name, step_type, code
def parse_users(self, stepNode): attr_map = {"log":False, "to":None, "question":None, "answerType":None, "answer":None, "iDontKnow":None, "renewDelay":None} self.parse_attributes(stepNode,attr_map) name = stepNode.getAttribute("name") step_type = stepNode.tagName code = wf_templates.users_step.format(step_name = name,**attr_map) return name, step_type, code
def parse_archive(self, stepNode): attr_map = {"log":False} self.parse_attributes(stepNode,attr_map) name = stepNode.getAttribute("name") step_type = stepNode.tagName code = wf_templates.archive_step.format(step_name = name,**attr_map) return name, step_type, code
def parse_notification(self, stepNode): attr_map = {"log":False, "notifyByEmail":False, "notifyByPopup":False, "emailTo":None, "emailObject":None, "emailContent":None, "emailAttachDocument":False, "emailDocument":None, "popupTo":None, "popupContent":None } self.parse_attributes(stepNode,attr_map) name = stepNode.getAttribute("name") step_type = stepNode.tagName code = wf_templates.notification_step.format(step_name = name,**attr_map) return name, step_type, code
def parse_stop(self, stepNode): attr_map = {"log":False,"logData":None} self.parse_attributes(stepNode,attr_map) name = stepNode.getAttribute("name") step_type = stepNode.tagName code = wf_templates.final_step.format(step_name = name,**attr_map) return name, step_type, code
def parse_gateway(self, stepNode): attr_map = {"log":False,"logData":None} self.parse_attributes(stepNode,attr_map) name = stepNode.getAttribute("name") step_type = stepNode.tagName code = wf_templates.gateway_step.format(step_name = name,**attr_map) return name, step_type, code
def parse_scripting(self, stepNode): attr_map = {"log":False,"logData":None, "source":None} self.parse_attributes(stepNode,attr_map) name = stepNode.getAttribute("name") step_type = stepNode.tagName code = wf_templates.scripting_step.format(step_name = name,**attr_map) return name, step_type, code
def parse_automatic(self, transitionNode): attr_map = {"log":False} self.parse_attributes(transitionNode,attr_map) name = transitionNode.getAttribute("name") transition_type = transitionNode.tagName source_step = transitionNode.getAttribute("src") connected_step = transitionNode.getAttribute("tgt")
code = wf_templates.transition_auto.format(transition_name = name,connected_step = connected_step,**attr_map) return name, transition_type, source_step, connected_step, code
def parse_conditional(self, transitionNode): attr_map = {"condition":False,"log":False} self.parse_attributes(transitionNode,attr_map) name = transitionNode.getAttribute("name") transition_type = transitionNode.tagName source_step = transitionNode.getAttribute("src") connected_step = transitionNode.getAttribute("tgt")
condition = attr_map["condition"] if "condition" in attr_map else "False" code = wf_templates.transition_condition.format(transition_name = name,connected_step = connected_step, **attr_map) return name, transition_type,source_step, connected_step, code
def parse_error(self, transitionNode): attr_map = {"errorCode":None,"log":False} self.parse_attributes(transitionNode,attr_map) name = transitionNode.getAttribute("name") transition_type = transitionNode.tagName source_step = transitionNode.getAttribute("src") connected_step = transitionNode.getAttribute("tgt")
code = wf_templates.transition_error.format(transition_name = name,connected_step = connected_step, **attr_map) return name, transition_type,source_step, connected_step, code
def parse_timeout(self, transitionNode): attr_map = {"timeoutAfter":None,"log":False} self.parse_attributes(transitionNode,attr_map) name = transitionNode.getAttribute("name") transition_type = transitionNode.tagName source_step = transitionNode.getAttribute("src") connected_step = transitionNode.getAttribute("tgt")
code = wf_templates.transition_timeout.format(transition_name = name,connected_step = connected_step, **attr_map) return name, transition_type,source_step, connected_step, code
def gen_steplist(self, steplist): return "{" + ",".join(["self.step_%s:\"%s\""%(step_name,step_type) for step_name,step_type in steplist])+"}" #return "{" + ",".join(["\"%s\":(\"%s\",\"%s\")"%(step_name,step_name,step_type) for step_name,step_type in steplist])+"}"
def gen_transitionlist(self, transitionlist): #buf = '{step_' #for key in transitionlist: # buf +=key+':(transition_'+', transition_'.join(transitionlist[key])+'), ' #buf += '}' buf = '{self.step_'+', self.step_'.join([key+':[self.transition_'+', self.transition_'.join(transitionlist[key])+']' for key in transitionlist])+'}' #'{step_'+', step_'.join(finalsteps)+'}' return buf
def gen_finalsteps(self, finalsteps): return '[self.step_'+', self.step_'.join(finalsteps)+']'
def compile_scripting(self, old_value): #value = old_value.replace("$(%s)"%self.wf_name, "WF_proxy(getattr(self,\"id\", None), self.__module__)") value = old_value.replace("$(%s)"%self.wf_name, "WF_proxy(None, '%s')"%self.wf_name)
value = re.sub(r"\$\((\w+)\)","Step_proxy(self.id,\"\g<1>\",self.steplist[self.step_\g<1>])",value,re.M+re.U) value = value.replace('=','==') return value

import re class LDAPUser: def __init__( self, guid = '', first_name = '', last_name = '', email = '', phone = '', groups = [], user_class = '' ):
self.guid = guid self.first_name = first_name self.last_name = last_name self.email = email self.phone = phone self.groups = groups
def fill_from_ldapobject( self, userconnection, config, ldapobject ): first_name_attr = config.get_attribute( 'first_name' ) first_name_val = ldapobject.attributes[first_name_attr] if first_name_attr in ldapobject.attributes else ' ' # raise Exception( self.first_name ) self.first_name = first_name_val
last_name_attr = config.get_attribute( 'last_name' ) last_name_val = ldapobject.attributes[ last_name_attr ] if last_name_attr in ldapobject.attributes else ' '
self.last_name = last_name_val
phone_attr = config.get_attribute( 'phone' ) phone_val = ldapobject.attributes[phone_attr] if phone_attr in ldapobject.attributes else ' '
self.phone = phone_val
email_attr = config.get_attribute( 'email' ) email_val = ldapobject.attributes[email_attr] if email_attr in ldapobject.attributes else ' ' self.email = email_val
guid_attr = config.get_attribute( 'user_guid' ) regexp = re.compile( '%s=*' % guid_attr ) list = str(ldapobject.dn).split(',') for attr in ldapobject.attributes: list += ldapobject.attributes[attr]
# raise Exception( list ) for item in list: if re.match( regexp, item ): guid_val = item self.guid = guid_val
group_attr = config.get_attribute( 'groups_in_user' ) groups_val = ldapobject.attributes[group_attr] if group_attr and group_attr in ldapobject.attributes else [] self.groups = groups_val return self
def save( self, ldapconnection, config ): # raise Exception( self.email, self.guid, self.first_name, self.last_name) email = self.email guid = self.guid first_name = self.first_name last_name = self.last_name
baseDN = config.get_attribute("base_dn")
guid_attr_name = config.get_attribute( 'user_guid' )
user_dn = config.get_attribute( 'user_dn' )
object_class = config.get_attribute( 'user_class' )
last_name_attr = config.get_attribute( 'last_name' )
email_attr_name = config.get_attribute( 'email' )
first_name_attr = config.get_attribute( 'first_name' ) # raise Exception( guid_attr_name, user_dn, object_class, email_attr_name, first_name_attr )
# raise Exception ( "%s=%s" % (guid_attr_name, guid), "%s," % user_dn + baseDN ) ldap_user = ldapconnection.create_object( ["%s=%s" % (guid_attr_name, guid), "%s,%s" % (user_dn, baseDN) ], { 'objectClass' : [ object_class ], guid_attr_name : [ guid ], last_name_attr : [ last_name ], email_attr_name : [ email ], "cn" : ["violation"] }) ldapconnection.save( ldap_user ) return self
@classmethod def create( self, ldapconnection, config, email='' ): """ create user """ if not email: email = self.email
# ldapobject = scheme.userobject() # ldapconnection = scheme.userconnection()
# config = scheme.config
baseDN = config.get_attribute("base_dn") # guid_attr_name = config.get_attribute( 'guid' ) guid = str(uuid.uuid4()) user_dn = config.get_attribute( 'user_dn' ) object_class = config.get_attribute( 'user_class' ) last_name_attr = config.get_attribute( 'last_name' ) email_attr_name = config.get_attribute( 'email' ) first_name_attr = config.get_attribute( 'first_name' )
ldap_user = ldapconnection.create_object( ["%s=%s" % guid_attr_name, guid, "%s,%s" % user_dn, baseDN], { 'objectClass' : [ object_class ], guid_attr_name : [ guid ], last_name_attr : [ ' ' ], email_attr_name : [ email ] })
return LDAPUser().fill_from_ldapobject( scheme, ldap_user )
@classmethod def get_users( self, ldapconnection, config, email='', guid='' ): """ """ # ldapobject = scheme.userobject()
filter = '(objectClass=%s)' % config.get_attribute( 'user_class' ) if guid: filter += '(%s=%s)' % ( config.get_attribute( 'guid' ), guid ) if email: filter += '(%s=%s)' % ( config.get_attribute( 'email' ), email )
filter = '(&' + filter + ')'
users_dn = '%s,'% config.get_attribute( 'user_dn' ) + config.get_attribute( 'base_dn' )
# raise Exception( filter, users_dn ) # raise Exception( ldapconnection ) users = ldapconnection.search( users_dn, filter, True ) # raise Exception( users )
return [ LDAPUser().fill_from_ldapobject( ldapconnection, config, user ) for user in users ]
@classmethod def get_groups( self, ldapconnection, config, email, guid ): user_in_group = config.get_attribute( 'users_in_group' ) if not user_in_group: group_in_user = config.get_attribute( 'groups_in_user' ) if not group_in_user: return [] return _group_in_user(ldapconnection, config, email, guid) return _user_in_group(ldapconnection, config, email, guid)
# connection = scheme.userconnection()
def _group_in_user( ldapconnection, config, email, guid ): users = self.get_users( ldapconnection, config, email, guid ) group_attr = config.get_attribute( 'groups_in_user' )
group_dns = [] for user in users: group_dns += user.groups groups = [] for group in group_dns: groups.append( ldapconnection.get_by_dn( str(group) ) ) return [ LDAPGroup().fill_from_ldapobject( ldapconnection, config, group ) for group in groups ]
def _user_in_group( ldapconnection, config, email, guid ): users = LDAPUser.get_users( ldapconnection, scheme, email, guid ) groups = [] for user in users: filter = '(%s=%s)' % config.get_attribute( 'users_in_group' ), user.dn filter += '(objectClass=%s)' % config.get_attribute( 'group_class' ) group_dn = '%s,'% config.get_attribute( 'group_dn' ) + config.get_attribute( 'base_dn' ) ldap_groups = ldapconnection.search( group_dn, filter, False ) for group in ldap_groups: if not group in groups: groups.append( LDAPGroup().fill_from_ldapobject( ldapconnection, config, group) ) return groups
# assert issubclass(LDAPUser, User) # assert ininstance(LDAPUser(), User)
class LDAPGroup:
def __init__( self, name = '', guid = '', users = '' ): self._name = name self._guid = guid if guid else uuid.uuid4() self._users = users
@classmethod def create( self, ldapconnection, config, name='' ): """ create user """ if not name: name = ' '
baseDN = config.get_attribute("base_dn") guid_attr_name = config.get_attribute( 'group_guid' ) guid = str(uuid.uuid4()) group_dn = config.get_attribute( 'group_dn' ) object_class = config.get_attribute( 'group_class' )
user_in_group_attr = config.get_attribute( 'users_in_group' ) if user_in_group_attr: user_in_group = '' ldap_user = ldapconnection.create_object( ["%s=%s" % guid_attr_name, guid, "%s," % group_dn + baseDN], { 'objectClass' : [ object_class ], guid_attr_name : [ guid ], name_attr : [ name ], user_in_group_attr : [ user_in_group ], }) else: ldap_user = ldapconnection.create_object( ["%s=%s" % guid_attr_name, guid, "%s," % group_dn + baseDN], { 'objectClass' : [ object_class ], guid_attr_name : [ guid ], name_attr : [ name ], })
return LDAPGroup().fill_from_ldapobject( ldapconnection, config, ldap_user )
@classmethod def get_groups( self, ldapconnection, config, name='', guid='', user="" ): """ """ # ldapobject = scheme.userobject() # ldapconnection = scheme.userconnection()
filter = '(objectClass=%s)' % config.get_attribute( 'group_class' )
if guid: filter += '(%s=%s)' % config.get_attribute( 'group_guid' ), guid if name: filter += '(%s=%s)' % config.get_attribute( 'name' ), name
filter = '(&' + filter + ')'
group_dn = '%s,'% config.get_attribute( 'group_dn' ) + config.get_attribute( 'base_dn' ) # raise Exception( group_dn, filter ) groups = ldapconnection.search(group_dn, filter, False)
return [ LDAPGroup().fill_from_ldapobject( ldapconnection, config, group ) for group in groups ]
@classmethod def get_users( self, ldapconnection, config, name = '', guid = '', group = None ): user_in_group = config.get_attribute( 'users_in_group' )
if not user_in_group: group_in_user = config.get_attribute( 'groups_in_user' ) if not group_in_user: return [] return LDAPGroup._group_in_user( ldapconnection, config, name, guid, group = self if self else group ) return LDAPGroup._user_in_group( ldapconnection, config, name, guid ) #, group = self if self else group )
@staticmethod def _group_in_user( ldapconnection, name = '', guid = '', group = None ):
# connection = userconnection()
users = LDAPUser.get_users( ldapconnection, config )
filter = '(objectClass=%s)' % config.get_attribute( 'group_class' ) if group: guid = group.guid name = group.name if guid: filter += '(%s=%s)' % ( config.get_attribute( 'guid' ), guid ) if name: filter += '(%s=%s)' % ( config.get_attribute( 'name' ), name ) filter = '(&' + filter + ')' group_dn = config.get_attribute( 'group_dn' )
result = []
for user in users: for group in user.groups: group_ = ldapconnection.search( group_dn, filter, recursive = False ) group_ = LDAPGroup().fill_from_ldapobject(group_[0]) if group_[0] else None if group_ and group_.name == name or group_.guid == guid: result.append( user ) return result
@staticmethod def _user_in_group( ldapconnection, config, name, guid ): # connection = scheme.userconnection() groups = LDAPGroup.get_groups( ldapconnection, config, name, guid )
filter = '(objectClass=%s)' % config.get_attribute( 'user_class' ) user_dn = config.get_attribute( 'user_dn' )
result = [] for group in groups: for user in group.users: filter += '(%s)' % user filter = '(&' + filter + ')' user_ = ldapconnection.get_by_dn( user ) #apobject(user_) if user else None if user_: result.append( LDAPUser().fill_from_ldapobject( ldapconnection, config, user_ ) ) # raise Exception( result[0].email ) return result
def fill_from_ldapobject( self, ldapconnection, config, ldapobject ): # raise Exception(ldapconnection, config )
name_attr = config.get_attribute( 'group_name' ) name = ldapobject.attributes[name_attr] self.name = name
guid_attr = config.get_attribute( 'group_guid' ) regexp = re.compile( '%s=*' % guid_attr ) list = str(ldapobject.dn).split(',')
for attribute in ldapobject.attributes: list.append( ldapobject.attributes[attribute] )
for item in list: if re.match( regexp, str(item) ): guid = item
user_attr = config.get_attribute( 'users_in_group' ) # raise Exception( user_attr ) # raise Exception( ldapobject.attributes[user_attr]) users = ( ldapobject.attributes[user_attr] if user_attr and user_attr in ldapobject.attributes else [] )#.split( ',' ) # raise Exception( users ) self.users = users
return self
